name: Just Stay Off The Grid
description:
Known Bugs:

- Only Play it in small window

- Player will dissapear sometimes. Please return to Menu and start again.

Discribtion:

Input = Mouse

Zoom out if the window doesn't fit.

Retro style game, make your own record to do it take the yellow points, but be careful deadly obstacles could eliminate you from the game, stay out of the grid, if you are not careful you will lose.

Instead to make the game in 6 Days it was made in 3.... oops :)
